Auto-scan interval (ms): Muda wa skani ya moja kwa moja (ms)
Added real-time scanning and image captu: Imeongezwa uwezo wa skani ya moja kwa moja na upigaji picha
Implemented history feature for saved sc: Imeanzisha kipengele cha historia kwa skani zilizohifadhiwa
Implemented a chatbot for personalized a: Imeanzisha chatbot kwa msaada wa kibinafsi; inayoendeshwa na Gemini AI ya Google
Added Authentication page (Signup, Signi: Imeongeza ukurasa wa uthibitisho (kujisajili, kuingia na Uthibitisho wa Muungano (Google Oauth))
Integrated with firebase to store user d: Imeunganishwa na Firebase kuhifadhi maelezo ya mtumiaji na skani
Integrated Google's Gemini AI for Image: Imeunganisha Gemini AI ya Google kwa uchambuzi na utabiri wa picha
Added a health diagnostic agent powered: Imeongeza wakala wa uchunguzi wa afya unaoendeshwa na Gemini AI ya Google
Point the camera at an object you want t: Elekeza kamera kwenye kitu unachotaka kuchanganua
Tap the camera button to capture and ana: Gonga kitufe cha kamera ili kunasa na kuchanganua picha
View the scan results and save them if d: Tazama matokeo ya uchanganuzi na uyaokoe ikiwa unataka
Access your scan history using the searc: Fikia historia yako ya uchanganuzi ukitumia kitufe cha utafutaji
Adjust settings using the gear icon: Rekebisha mipangilio ukitumia ikoni ya gia
Click on the image icon; left to the cam: Bofya kwenye ikoni ya picha; kushoto kwa kitufe cha kamera ili kuchagua picha kutoka kwenye galari yako kuchanganua
